Column Description: Unique identifier for a client account within Aurelia systems.
Attribute related business rationale: Enables unique identification and traceability of client accounts across Aurelia systems.

Column Description: Full legal name of the client as captured during onboarding.
Attribute related business rationale: Required for legal identification, contracts, and regulatory reporting.
Attribute logical business rules: Mandatory; must match onboarding legal documentation

Column Description: Primary mailing address field from onboarding; may include house number and street type.
Attribute related business rationale: Supports correspondence, jurisdiction checks, and KYC validation.

Column Description: Date when the account was officially opened in Aurelia systems.
Attribute related business rationale: Determines account age, lifecycle stage, and regulatory timelines.

Column Description: Account balance in the client's local reporting currency.
Attribute related business rationale: Used for client reporting, interest calculation, and exposure assessment.

Column Description: Account balance converted to USD using internal FX rates.
Attribute related business rationale: Enables consolidated financial and risk reporting across currencies.

Column Description: Internal agent/employee identifier referencing relationship manager.
Attribute related business rationale: Supports accountability and client servicing ownership.
Attribute logical business rules: Optional; must reference valid employee record

Column Description: Internal fee tier for the product applicable to the client.
Attribute related business rationale: Drives fee calculation and revenue attribution.

Column Description: The legal entity where the trade or account is booked.
Attribute related business rationale: Required for accounting, tax, and regulatory reporting.
Attribute logical business rules: Must exist in legal entity reference data

Column Description: Channel through which client onboarded (Branch, Online, Broker).
Attribute related business rationale: Enables channel performance analysis and risk profiling.

Column Description: Type of account (Custody, Trading, Lending, Savings).
Attribute related business rationale: Determines applicable products and controls.

Column Description: ISO currency code for the account (e.g., EUR, USD, PLN).
Attribute related business rationale: Enables correct valuation and FX processing.

Column Description: Most recent date of transaction activity on the account.
Attribute related business rationale: Identifies dormant or inactive accounts.

Column Description: Number of open operational or client issues linked to account.
Attribute related business rationale: Tracks unresolved issues.

Column Description: Service level agreement category for the client.
Attribute related business rationale: Drives service prioritization and SLAs.

Column Description: Source system for the record (OnboardSys, CRM, CoreBank).
Attribute related business rationale: Supports lineage and reconciliation.

Column Description: Timestamp when the record was last updated in the system.
Attribute related business rationale: Enables auditability and data freshness monitoring.

Column Description: KYC completion status (Pending/Completed/Deceased).
Attribute related business rationale: Indicates regulatory compliance status of the client.

Column Description: AML monitoring alert level (None/Low/Watch/High).
Attribute related business rationale: Supports financial crime monitoring and escalation workflows.

Column Description: Approved credit limit for lending products.
Attribute related business rationale: Used for exposure control and credit risk monitoring.

Column Description: Type of collateral associated with credit facilities.
Attribute related business rationale: Supports secured lending.

Column Description: Declared tax residency country of the client.
Attribute related business rationale: Required for tax reporting.

Column Description: Named beneficial owner when different from account holder.
Attribute related business rationale: Ensures transparency of ownership structures.

Column Description: Internal reporting bucket used for regulatory returns.
Attribute related business rationale: Enables regulatory aggregation.
